verses.roman:
'mumukṣu' jagate aneka saṁsārī jana
'mukti' lāgi' bhaktye kare kṛṣṇera bhajana

synonyms: mumukṣu—desiring to be liberated; jagate—in this world; aneka—many; saṁsārī jana—engaged in material activities; mukti lāgi'-for the sake of liberation; bhaktye—in devotional service; kare—perform; kṛṣṇera bhajana—the worship of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "There are many people within this material world who desire liberation, and for this purpose they render devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa.
